programme.desc: The Cooper Extraction: Sheldon has to go back to Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he's away, the gang gather at the flat to decorate the Christmas tree. (S7 Ep11)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hesitation Ramification: Penny's big TV acting break hits the cutting-room floor, so Leonard does his best to comfort her, which leads her to ask him a bold question. (S7 Ep12)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Box of Treasure and the Meemaw of Science: Sheldon, Dr Linkletter and Meemaw team up on a science experiment. And Georgie has a new side hustle. (S4 Ep12)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: The Geezer Bus and a New Model for Education: Sheldon refuses to ride in a car after getting into an accident with Meemaw. (S4 Ep13)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Marco Polo: The Dunphys move into a cramped hotel room while their house is getting treated for mould. (S6 Ep4)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Won't You Be Our Neighbor: Phil is selling the house next door and he and Claire are excited by the prospect of having wonderful new neighbours. (S6 Ep5)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: We're on the Road to D'oh-where: Homer misses a Moe's Tavern trip to Las Vegas when he has to drive Bart to juvenile delinquent camp. (S17 Ep11/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Fair Laddy: Lisa tries to transform Groundskeeper Willie into a gentleman after his shack collapses and he's forced to move in with the Simpsons. (S17 Ep12/22)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Locomotion Interruption: Leonard and Amy take an impromptu road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon when his epic railway journey ends in chaos. Penny has an interview. (S8 Ep1)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Junior Professor Solution: When Sheldon has to teach a course at the university, Howard enrols in his class. Tension brews between Penny and Bernadette. (S8 Ep2)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The First Pitch Insufficiency: Howard's nervous when NASA ask him to throw the first pitch at a baseball game. Sheldon claims his and Amy's relationship is the best in the gang. (S8 Ep3)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Food Wife: An unexpected restaurant detour inspires Marge, Lisa and Bart to start their own food blog. (S23 Ep5/22)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Clare's devastated when a child goes missing, while Grace wrestles with guilt and Jez's secrets edge close to the surface. A father protects his child, and a teen's conscience weighs heavy.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Good, the Sad and the Drugly: A volunteer inspires Bart to become a better person. Lisa writes an essay about what Springfield will be like in 50 years. (S20 Ep17/21)

programme.title: New: Below Deck Down Under
programme.desc: Brand new series - Find Me Some Budgie to Love: A deckhand's fate is up in the air after an egregious error. The second officer tries to escape a rocky romantic past. (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics have been watching You, Coronation Street, Strictly Come Dancing, Celebrity Trash Monsters: What's Your Waste Size? and other top TV. (S18 Ep6)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics have been watching Squid Game, Strictly Come Dancing, The Mating Game, Family Fortunes, Extreme Food Phobics, and The Hairy Bikers Go North. (S18 Ep4)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Painter and lawyer Josh courts student and waiter Sophia. Leslie and Babs bond over their mutual admiration for Michelle Obama. Property developer Amanda meets sales exec Brad. (S9 Ep7)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Celebration Reverberation: Sheldon and Howard plan birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley. Leonard is stressed by a Christmas letter from his brother. (S11 Ep11)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Matrimonial Metric: Sheldon and Amy secretly test their friends, to work out who should be best man and maid of honour at their wedding. (S11 Ep12)

programme.desc: Mystery of the Forgotten Mystery: Taylor and her friends must save the island from an ancient piece of glass that wipes everyone's memories. Will they remember there is an island to save? (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Dodging Danger: When Henry uses his new super power to compete in a Dodge-A-Leen tournament, Ray, Schwoz, and Charlotte go undercover to teach Henry a lesson. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Space Invaders, Part 1: When Captain Man and Kid Danger find out that an astronaut has been taken hostage on the Space Station, they use Schwoz's shuttle to head into space. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Shred It Go: Phoebe is devastated when she thinks the family's new shredder has accidentally destroyed her concert tickets, not realising that Max has them. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Blue Detective: When Max's skin turns blue while out on a date, everybody becomes a suspect as he turns super-sleuth in an effort to find out whodunnit. (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: The Girl Who Cried Danger: Volt and ShoutOut hatch a plan to stop their super-clinger fan from making false alarm emergency calls. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Robarazzi: Tori suggests Robbie get videos of students' everyday lives to increase his blog traffic. When the camera is turned on Tori, she asks him to stop - but he doesn't! (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Teamwork Makes The Scene Work: Will being an actor make you popular? When the drama teacher announces the best actor in their class will get to perform at assembly, Lydia is thrilled. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: One Henry, Three Girls - Part 1: While trying to capture The Mad Granny, who keeps terrorizing Captain Man, Henry is forced to juggle his work life and his romantic life. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: One Henry, Three Girls - Part 2: Henry's romantic life gets still more complicated, as the return of Chloe means that going to the dance with her and Brianna may not be possible. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Robin Hood - Prince of Pheebs: When Chloe announces that Max is her favourite, Phoebe tells a bedtime story about the great Phoebe Hood and the evil Maxingham. (S3, ep 25)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Aunt Misbehavin': Max & Phoebe give their mom the ultimate birthday surprise by tracking down her long lost sister, but then they discover that they've been feuding for years. (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Bird Scene: Tori tries to master an iconic Hollywood Arts monologue in Sikowitz's class. Andre and Robbie join a ballet class hoping to meet girls, with disastrous results. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Stage Fighting: Jade claims that Tori hurt her for real in a stage fighting exercise. Trina has to fend off Robbie when he thinks that their stage kiss meant something. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Balm Squad: The annual skip-a-thon fundraiser is taking place, and students are encouraged to take part to help raise money for charity and win a private all-expenses-paid pizza party! (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Riperton.

programme.desc: Two is better than one... good things come in pairs... you get the idea! Here's a 70s icon with some more 70s icons - both duos & some killer collaborations!

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 70s
programme.desc: Experience the magic of the 70s, where every beat was a spell and every song a timeless enchantment!

programme.title: Rocket Man! Elton in the 70s
programme.desc: His national treasure status has grown with time, and every one of these songs is now considered a classic. These are Elton's big hits in order, from 1971's 'Your Song' onwards.

programme.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night!

programme.title: We're Feelin' 70s All Over!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.desc: The ever-smooth Simes dusts off his flares, fires up the lava lamp & takes you on a psychedelic spin through the 70s. Side effects may include sudden urges to perm your hair!

programme.title: 1971 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1971!

programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Robo Teacher: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks it's going to be the best day ever. He's wrong. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Glove Glove Me Do: Owen's newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tooth About Zombies: Gwen's favourite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beth's nightmare event, dental check-up day. The two girls find a way to help each other out. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Disco Duel: Goha sends a disco-duelling duellist to take down Rush Duels! (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Sorry For the Wait, Beerus-sama: The Super Saiyan God is Finally Born!: Despite learning how to make a Super Saiyan God, there's a problem - one more Saiyan is needed for the transformation. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: CodE.T.: When Cody gets sick, the kids want to send a message back to his home planet in the hope that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favour of the plan. (S3 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Quiche it Goodbye: When an 'evil conglomerate' is threatening to take over Chef's favourite childhood restaurant, Owen rallies the kids to take them down. (S3 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ice Guys Finish Last: Chef brings a souvenir iceberg home from a trip to the South Pole and Duncan finds a prehistoric surprise inside. (S3 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 1: When Chef discovers his spooky Halloween pranks have never scared the kids, he's devastated, and agrees to hand over full control of his pranking to Gwen. (S3 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 2: Gwen's plan turns out far spookier than Chef ever hoped. (S3 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Trousering Inferno: The Bad Guy Busters must reunite to save Izzy after Harold uncovers her previous identity and leads a super villain from her past right to her. (S3 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Big Bangs Theory: Chef forgets the password for his computer, but knows it has something to do with one of the 99 previous explosions that took out the school. (S3 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mad Math: Taffy Road: After Courtney refuses to share her taffy winnings from a 'calculus for candy' competition, she's transported to a desolate future. (S3 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Sugar & Spice & Lightning & Frights: Two new kids show up at the daycare. Duncan and Leshawna take issue with not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Papa Race: The Tikis face the Cold Kings in the Marshes, a place crawling with Lion Lilies. Seeking for a solution, Enki ventures alone into the jungle. Corto then rushes to his rescue. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Welcome to Paroa: Corto has wrecked Maroro! To find a crucial part, the Tikis go to the Shore Scrubber's market, in Paroa. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.desc: ..programmes start at 6.00am

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn dewis lliwiau ar gyfer eu tai chwarae. Red and Blue choose colours for their playhouses.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon fe awn ni i'r haul i ddweud helo i'r llew ac i'r oerfel i gwrdd 'r pengwin. We take to the sun to say hello to the lion and to the cold to meet the penguin.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Tomi Broch wedi cael llond bol ar y tywydd oer ac mae'n mynd i gynhesu o flaen y tn yn nhy Benja. When Tomi Broch decides he's had enough of the cold he takes shelter by the fire.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo eisiau gwybod beth sy'n digwydd ym mhennod nesaf ei hoff sioe deledu, ac mae ef a'r anifeiliaid yn mynd ar daith am yr ateb. Pablo wants to know more about his fave TV programme.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trn stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn teithio ar y Pip Cyflym... trn sy'n teithio ar draws Pentre Papur Pop! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are aboard the Zip Express.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn cwrdd ag archeolegydd sy'n cloddio mewn mynwent ger y Barri. An unusual hockey team in Cardiff is looking for new players of all ages, and we'll also hear your stories.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'r traeth yn llawn o ryfeddodau lliwgar. Mae Fflwff a'i fryd ar gysgodwr gwynt, a'r Capten a Seren a'u llygaid ar gylch rwber a pharasol. The beach is full of lovely colourful things!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Dringwyr ydy Stiw a Taid yn eu gm, a mynydd i'w ddringo ydy grisiau'r ty. Stiw and Taid pretend to be mountaineers, and that the stairs are a mountain to climb.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae 'na sr gwib di-rif yn gwibio heibio'r roced ac mae Jangl yn ceisio eu cyfri ond yn ei gweld yn amhosib. Jangl is trying to count shooting stars. There must be an easier way!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae estron bach yn gadael anrheg i'r cwn mae'n rhaid i'r Pawenlu warchod creadur od o'r gofod. When a little stranger leaves the pups a present, they have to babysit a space creature.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweld Bywyd Gwyllt Glaslyn, mynd am dro i Gastell Dryslwyn, a hwyl mewn Ysgol Goedwig ger Caerfyrddin. Join Meleri and Huw as they go on all sorts of open air adventures.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cn llawn egni i helpu plant ddysgu am rannau o'r corff. An energetic song that will help children learn about parts of their body.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Llyfryn wedi rhwygo un o'i dudalennau wrth chwarae cuddio ac wedi dechrau byhafio'n rhyfedd a chreu swynion od. Llyfryn has started to behave strangely, making odd and weird spells.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Crugwen yn ymddeol ac mae Cadi a'r dreigiau yn trefnu parti ffarwelio syrpreis iddi. Crugwen is retiring and Cadi and the dragons are planning a surprise farewell party.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu cadw'n heini er mwyn ennill ras yn erbyn y gwencwn. Crawc resolves to keep fit in order to win the racing challenge thrown down by the weasels.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Du a Gwyn yn paentio dinas gyda help eu ffrind newydd, Llwyd. Black and White colour a city with the help of new friend, Grey.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ac anifeiliaid bach y byd ac yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn dod i nabod y gorilla a'r sglefren for. In this programme we get to know the gorilla and the jellyfish.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wedi i Guto gymryd un o blu cynffon Hen Ben mae'n rhaid rasio drwy'r cwm i geisio'i chael yn l. When Guto takes one of Hen Ben's tail-feathers, a wild chase ensues across the valley.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond pan mae o'n gweld pry copyn dychrynllyd mewn llyfr, mae o'n rhedeg i ffwrdd. Beth sydd i'w wneud? Today, Pablo is quite scared by a spider!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Twm yn gwarchod ffrindiau blewog newydd... teulu o Alpacas! When the Alpacas Twm is looking after wander off, can he find a way to get them back?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Bu Newffion yn holi barn plant ysgol Cymru am ginio ysgol, a chawn glywed lawer o hanesion difyr.Today, the children of a Welsh school tell us what they think about school lunches.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Aled Samuel a Bethan Scorey sy'n edrych ar gartrefi Cymru drwy'r oesoedd. Y tro hwn byddwn yn edrych ar dai o'r cyfnod Fictoraidd. This time we focus on houses from the Victorian period. [SL]

programme.title: 3 Lle: Hywel Gwynfryn
programme.desc: Hywel Gwynfryn sy'n ein tywys i dri lle sydd wedi bod yn bwysig yn ei fywyd; Theatr Fach Llangefni, Castell Caerdydd a Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru. Hywel Gwynfryn visits 3 places he loves.

programme.title: Hewlfa Drysor

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n paratoi syrpries i Cain! Will everything go according to plan? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends plan a secret surprise for Fly.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes unrhyw ffordd o goginio selsig, mae'r Chef Cef yn dod i'r adwy! When there's no way of cooking sausages it's Chef Cef come to the rescue!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae cefnder Twm Twrch o Awstralia wedi cyrraedd ac yn barod i fynd ar antur fawr. Twm Twrch's cousin from Australia, Cynog Cyhyrog, has arrived and is ready to go on a dangerous adventure.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Bu Newffion yn holi pobol ar y stryd pa iaith mae nhw'n siarad gyda'u cwn, ac hefyd yn holi awdur sydd wedi ysgrifennu llyfr am y pwnc. Today, we learn about a rare bird in Llanuwchllyn!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Li Ban
programme.desc: Mae Li Ban a Dyf yn dod o hyd i Dai Na-nog ac yn ei holi'n dwll am y gwir. Li Ban and Dyf confront Dai Na-nog who reveals that it was Cawdel the druid who forced him to gift the horse.

programme.title: Tekkers
programme.desc: Heledd Anna, Lloyd Lewis a Huw Owen sy'n herio dau dm newydd o bl-droedwyr ifanc yn stadiwm Tekkers. Teams from Ysgol Bro Gwydir and Ysgol Cynwyd Sant compete for the Tekkers trophy.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Cyfres wedi'i chyflwyno gan Heledd Cynwal, gyda llu o arbenigwyr wrth gefn. Cawn helpu 4 teulu sy'n ysu am gael gi - pa fath fydd yn eu siwtio? We help 4 families find their perfect dog.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Arthur dal ar drywydd y lladron, ond 'dyw'n cael fawr o lwyddiant ac mae ganddo dipyn o waith esbonio i bawb. Over at the Iard shop, Elliw panics when Iolo almost discovers her secret.

programme.title: Olobobs

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn darllen stori am 'Folant Fagddu' pan mae'n clywed swn rhuo y tu allan. Digbi is reading a story about a battle against 'Folant Fagddu' when he hears a roar outside.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pethau'n arnofio?'. Dyna mae Ela am wybod heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu stori sili arall i'w rannu am bysgod anweledig. Today, Tadcu is on hand to tell a silly story about invisible fish.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod cyntaf yr haf ac mae pawb yn edrych ymlaen at ddathlu. It's the first day of summer and everyone's looking forward to the celebration party.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn ffeindio be' ma nhw'n feddwl yw seren goll ar y traeth ac yn ceisio'i dychwelyd i'r awyr. The Woohoos find what they think is a fallen star on the beach and try to return it.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn cytuno codi arian i warchodfa asynnod drwy redeg ras noddedig. A fydd cyngor Sid, sy'n rhedwr profiadol, yn ei helpu? Sin agrees to take part in a sponsored run for donkeys.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Arloeswyr Pontypandy yn trio ennill bathodynnau adeiladu raft. Ond mae charjyr diffygiol Jams yn achosi tan. The Pontypandy pioneers are trying to win badges for building a raft.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan mae criw o nadroedd gwenwynig yn cael eu darganfod yn sownd ar draeth, rhaid i Pegwn a'r Octonots eu hebrwng yn l i'r cefnfor. Pegwn has to get some poisonous snakes back to the sea.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Melyn yn brysur tu hwnt heddiw; mae bron pawb eisiau cot o baent ond does ganddi ddim amser i baentio pawb. Who can help Baba Melyn give everyone a coat of paint today?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae gan Digbi gyfeiriwr newydd sbon ac mae'n awyddus iawn i weld pa mor dda mae'n gweithio. Digbi has a new Direction Finder he's desperate to try out. A sudden fog-fall gives him a chance.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Er bod ei chwiorydd yn gwneud hwyl am ei ben, mae Deio'r hwyaden wrth ei fodd yn darllen llyfrau. Hurrah! Deio the duck finds a new friend who loves books as much as he does.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Ar l adeiladu castell eira yn y mynyddoedd oer, mae'r Abadas yn ymuno Ben i chwarae 'gm y geiriau'. After building a snow castle in the snowy mountains, the Abadas play the word game.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn cael hwyl yn dringo i ben y mynydd. Mae cymaint i'w weld a'i arogli yma. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop have the best time climbing to the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero am gael perfformio yng nghyngerdd Ocido felly mae'n rhaid dysgu chwarae offeryn! Blero and friends are to take part in a concert but first they must learn to play an instrument!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc, a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Rhaid i Joni ddysgu i lanhau os am gael ymuno gyda'i deulu yn y sioe awyr, a hynny heb dwyllo. Joni must learn to clean and clear if he wants to be able to join his family in the air show.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ifor Hael sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! The challenge is to collect as many clean teeth as possible and win the Dani Dant Trophy!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghoedwig yr Olobob yn gyffrous i glywed Norbet yn dweud jcs yn ei Sioe Ddigri, ond mae'r gynulleidfa yn anodd ei phlesio! Can the Olobobs help Norbet find his funny bone?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gobeithio mai dyma ei flwyddyn i ennill 'Y Ras Fawr'! Digbi hopes that this is his year to win 'The Great Race'! But Glenys tells Teifion that she must win the race.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar l trip i'r sw mae Jamal eisiau gwybod 'Beth oedd yr anifail cyntaf erioed?' Tadcu reels out a silly story about a tortoise by the name of Darwen, the only animal that lived on earth!

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na ben-blwydd arall yn yr harbwr heddiw - pen-blwydd yr harbwr ei hun. There's another birthday celebration at the harbour today - it's the harbour's birthday!

programme.title: Cacamwnci

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn deffro ar fore niwlog a'n meddwl bod Ynys Ddoeth wedi codi i'r cymylau. The Woohoos wake up on a foggy morning and think Wise Island has floated up into the clouds.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Sin persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Octonots

programme.title: Help Llaw

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: The Jump-up Boys. Stars Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie dons a white coat and takes a real job at last. But hearing that Budgie has gone straight, Charles suspects foul play. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: The Strange World Of Planet X
programme.desc: 1958. Sci-fi. A British laboratory studying magnetic fields is warned by a cosmic visitor of the dangers in their experiments. Starring Forrest Tucker and Martin Benson. [S]

programme.title: A Little of What You Fancy
programme.desc: 1968. A loving tribute to British Music Hall with Lily Morris & Gus Elen. Featuring original archive film, rare prints, portraits and photographs, it traces what remains of the great music halls. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Badlands. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Stephen McNally & Myron Healey. Bill Longley trails a ruthless bounty hunter who is in pursuit of a man falsely accused of bank robbery. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Celebration Blues. 1964. Stars Peggy Mount, David Kossoff & Barbara Mitchell. Alf arranges a secret booze-up to celebrate his birthday and Hetty uses an overheard conversation to get help. [S]

programme.title: Sky Liner
programme.desc: 1949. Thriller. Director: William Berke. Stars Richard Travis, Pamela Blake & Rochelle Hudson. An FBI Agent finds himself caught up in Cold War espionage when he boards a plane heading west. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: Moorings
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars Charles Boyer, Dorothy Malone & Will Wright. An overworked shipping magnate becomes entangled in the lives of a young boy and his blind mother.

programme.title: Echo Of Diana
programme.desc: 1963. Joan is distraught at the death of her husband in a plane crash but all is not what it seems. Stars: Vincent Ball & Betty McDowall. [S]

programme.title: Man From Tangier
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director: Lance Comfort. Stars Robert Hutton, Lisa Gastoni & Martin Benson. Chuck Collins finds himself involved in a passport and forgery racket, just through taking the wrong coat! [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout June. [S]

programme.title: Stock Car
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. After the death of her father while motor racing, the daughter (Rona Anderson) is dissuaded from selling his garage by fellow racer Larry (Paul Carpenter) who helps her run it. [S]

programme.title: Tiger By The Tail
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: John Gilling. John Desmond, (Larry Parks) meets a mysterious woman (Lisa Daniely) who turns out to be part of a counterfeit ring. Desmond is caught up in the whole affair. [S]

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by Monte Hellman. Stars Jack Nicholson, Cameron Mitchell & Millie Perkins. Three cowboys are pursued by a relentless posse after being mistaken for a gang of outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Two Wives at One Wedding
programme.desc: 1961. Crime. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Stars Gordon Jackson, Christina Gregg & Lisa Daniely. Tom's wedding day becomes a confusing nightmare when a stranger appears, claiming to be his wife. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Lafe Lingers On. 1964. Stars Donna Douglas, Peter Whitney & Max Baer Jr. Lafe Crick returns to the Clampett mansion with another scheme to try to get rich off of Jed's money. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1956. Destination Death. Director: Montgomery Tully. Stars Russell Napier, Paula Byrne and Melissa Stribling. A body at a London airport, and a flask of poison leads Scotland Yard to Lisbon.

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Reunion. 1976. Stars Bill Dean, Glynn Edwards & Jack Warner. Twenty years ago, a number of police officers were involved in a major operation at the Docks and now it's time for them to reunite. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Sweetheart Story/Tyring a Cart. 1986. Jack shows a film of a house sale he attended in Berkshire and recounts the story of two lovers at opposite ends of the Edwardian social ladder. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We take a trip to London in the 30s and spend a Sunday by the sea in the 50s. There's film magic and memory joggers with Merry Maids and bus signs, and we pay tribute to our friend Brian Murphy. [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1973. Detective & Mystery Drama. Home & Away. Stars Alfred Burke, Barbara Young, Bryan Pringle. Madge Reading turns to Marker when she suspects there is another woman in her husband's life. [S]

programme.title: Meantime
programme.desc: 1983. Comedy/Drama. Directed by Mike Leigh. Stars Marion Bailey, Tim Roth & Pam Ferris. A remarkable story following the lives of the Pollack family and their struggles to make ends meet. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: 1966. Action. Directed by Leslie Martinson. Stars Adam West, Burt Ward & Lee Meriwether. Catwoman, the Joker, the Penguin and the Riddler join forces to dispose of Batman and Robin. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: 1966. Action. Directed by Leslie Martinson. Stars Adam West, Burt Ward & Lee Meriwether. Catwoman, the Joker, the Penguin and the Riddler join forces to dispose of Batman and Robin. [S]

programme.title: Spanish Fly
programme.desc: 1976. Comedy. Director: Bob Kellett. Stars: Leslie Phillips, Terry-Thomas, Graham Armitage. A businessman is trying to shoot an ad for his company's new line of lingerie when he encounters a rival.

programme.title: Blood On The Sun
programme.desc: 1945. Thriller directed by Frank Lloyd and starring James Cagney and Sylvia Sidney. A dedicated American reporter in 1930s Japan is determined to expose the government's plan for world domination. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: This is Alsace. 1960. Alsace-Lorraine is well known as a winegrowing region; this film takes a look at the vineyards and at some of the less well-known sights in the locality.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Marshal Earp Meets General Lee. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian & Don Haggerty. A former Confederate officer threatens to destroy Ellsworth if Wyatt is not stripped of his badge and run out of town. [S]

programme.title: Command Performance
programme.desc: 1937. Stars Finlay Currie. A renowned stage singer leaves the theatre to become a gypsy after his voice weakens. Arthur Tracy (The Street Singer) and Lilli Palmer star in this romantic musical. [S]

programme.title: A Tale of Five Cities
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Stars Bonar Colleano, Barbara Kelly, Eva Bartok & Gina Lollobrigida. An Englishman leaves America to enlist in the RAF, but a drunken accident results in a loss of memory. [S]

programme.title: Algiers
programme.desc: 1938. Drama. Directed by John Cromwell. Stars Charles Boyer, Hedy Lamarr & Sigrid Gurie. A wanted jewel thief hiding in the Casbah meets a beautiful woman who makes him long for an escape. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout June. [S]

programme.title: Shadow of a Man
programme.desc: 1954. Crime drama. Director: Michael McCarthy. A town drunk is found dead and the police suspect murder. Starring Paul Carpenter. [S]

programme.title: Star of My Night
programme.desc: 1954. Romance. Directed by Paul Dickson. Stars Griffth Jones, Kathleen Byron & Hugh Williams. A cynical sculptor becomes inspired by a ballerina he meets, but this only enrages her jealous lover. [S]

programme.title: Fate Takes a Hand
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Director: Max Varnel. Stars Ronald Howard, Christina Gregg, Basil Dignam. Letters recovered from a stolen mail bag significantly impact the lives of the recipients 15 years later. [S]

programme.title: The House Across the Lake
programme.desc: 1954. Crime. Directed & written by Ken Hughes. Stars Alex Nicol, Hillary Brooke & Sidney James. An American living in England is enticed into a scheme by a beautiful blonde to murder her husband. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Incident at Midnight. 1962. Directed by Norman Harrison. Stars Anton Diffring, William Sylvester & Martin Miller. A drug addict recognises a man whom he knew as an active Nazi in Vienna. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: Murder in the Smart Set. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Shirley Cain & Harriette Johns. While investigating a murder, Agent Smith is put on the wrong track by a bitter gossip columnist. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King Gets Crowned. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King invades Wayne Manor to steal back a mistakenly rigged clock and attempts to rob Bruce's pocket watch collection. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Night Mail. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Marianne Benet & Victor Brooks. Maguire works with the railway police to track down a gang that has stolen mail from a London to Glasgow train. [S]

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: 1969. Drama. Directed by Richard C. Sarafian. Stars John Mills, Sylvia Syms & Gordon Jackson. A psychosomatically mute young boy finds an emotional release through his love for a wild white colt. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: The brilliant Caroline Munro is back to host another evening in The Cellar Club. The first offering tonight will make your skin crawl, as Caroline presents the sci-fi horror They Nest. [S]

programme.title: They Nest
programme.desc: 2000. Horror. Directed by Ellory Elkayem. Stars Thomas Calabro, Dean Stockwell & John Savage. A doctor must convince the residents of an island that there is an infestation of deadly cockroaches. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: A mind boggling mystery awaits in the second offering of the night. Caroline Munro introduces the 2002 mystery thriller Disappearance, starring Susan Dey and Harry Hamlin. [S]

programme.title: Disappearance
programme.desc: 2002. Mystery. Director: Walter Klenhard. Stars Harry Hamlin, Susan Dey, Basia A'Hern. While travelling through Nevada, a family stumbles upon a ghost town and make a series of grisly discoveries. [S]

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Raining Cats and Kroomis: When the hotel gains six newborn baby clouds who leave a trail of weather-related destruction in their wake, Bubble must find a way to contain them. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: The Golden Conch: When Delphina accuses Kroomi of losing her golden conch shell, Bubble sets out to find the true culprit. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: The Little Helpers: The industrious creatures known as Little Helpers become wildly over-helpful when people start keeping them as pets - can True restore order in the Rainbow Kingdom? (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: DinoCity

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Naughty Kraken: Kraken is the favourite pet of the Saur family! He follows Ricky and Tyra everywhere. This time, Kraken was playing with them in the yard. And then he got lost! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: DinoCity

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Little Cloud: Molang and Piu Piu are on holiday and are enjoying the sun. But Piu Piu is being chased by a funny cloud that's giving him shade... (S5 Ep43)

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: The Miniwhats
